statements: DELETE FROM marathon_races WHERE race_id = 100 AND athlete_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM marathon_races WHERE ranking < 5 OR finishing_time > '10:00:00';
DELETE FROM marathon_results WHERE participant_id = 10 AND ranking > 5;

DELETE FROM marathon_results WHERE race_date < '2022-01-01' AND ranking > 3;
